publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1733 Tommy Sheridan: Inquiry into Collapse of Chester Street Holdings and the Role of the Financial Services Agency—That the Parliament agrees to make urgent representations to Her Majesty’s Government in support of the call made by Tony Worthington MP for a full and public inquiry into the collapse of the insurance firm Chester Street Holdings and, in particular, the shameful role of the Financial Services Agency and believes that Her Majesty’s Government must guarantee 100% compensation for all citizens suffering from asbestos related illnesses.

S1M-1733 Tommy Sheridan: Inquiry into Collapse of Chester Street Holdings and the Role of the Financial Services Agency—That the Parliament agrees to make urgent representations to Her Majesty’s Government in support of the call made by Tony Worthington MP for a full and public inquiry into the collapse of the insurance firm Chester Street Holdings and, in particular, the shameful role of the Financial Services Agency and believes that Her Majesty’s Government must guarantee 100% compensation for all citizens suffering from asbestos related illnesses.
S1M-1733 Inquiry into Collapse of Chester Street Holdings and the Role of the Financial Services Agency (lodged on 8 March 2001) Tricia Marwick*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*

S1M-1733 Tommy Sheridan: Inquiry into Collapse of Chester Street Holdings and the Role of the Financial Services Agency—That the Parliament agrees to make urgent representations to Her Majesty’s Government in support of the call made by Tony Worthington MP for a full and public inquiry into the collapse of the insurance firm Chester Street Holdings and, in particular, the shameful role of the Financial Services Agency and believes that Her Majesty’s Government must guarantee 100% compensation for all citizens suffering from asbestos related illnesses. Supported by: Tricia Marwick, Mr Kenny MacAskill
S1M-1733 Inquiry into Collapse of Chester Street Holdings and the Role of the Financial Services Agency (lodged on 8 March 2001) Linda Fabiani*
